data.question: What is the empirical formula of the birefringent crystal discussed?
What method was used to synthesize C10H6NO2Cd(NO3)·2H2O?
What is the experimental energy gap of C10H6NO2Cd(NO3)·2H2O compared to isoquinoline-1-carboxylic acid?
Is the crystal structure of C10H6NO2Cd(NO3)·2H2O monoclinic?
What is the birefringence value of C10H6NO2Cd(NO3)·2H2O at 550 nm?
Does the UV cut-off edge of C10H6NO2Cd(NO3)·2H2O improve compared to isoquinoline-1-carboxylic acid?
What is the coordination number of Cd2+ in C10H6NO2Cd(NO3)·2H2O?
Is the decomposition temperature of C10H6NO2Cd(NO3)·2H2O lower than that of (C3N6H7)2SiF6·H2O?
What is the role of the π-conjugated [C10H6NO2]− group in the optical properties of C10H6NO2Cd(NO3)·2H2O?
data.answer: It contributes to the optical anisotropy and band-gap widening.

data.question: What is the crystal system of C10H6NO2Cd(NO3)·2H2O?
Does the combination of Cd2+ cations and π-conjugated groups lead to the formation of complex multi-structural units?
What is the UV cut-off edge of C10H6NO2Cd(NO3)·2H2O?
Is the birefringence of C10H6NO2Cd(NO3)·2H2O higher than that of commercial α-BaB204?
What is the significance of the edge-sharing connection in C10H6NO2Cd(NO3)·2H2O?
data.answer: It leads to enhanced optical anisotropy and band-gap widening.

data.question: What is the coordination environment of Cd2+ in C10H6NO2Cd(NO3)·2H2O?
data.answer: Connected by two O atoms in water molecules, two O atoms in [NO3]−, three O atoms in the carboxyl group, and an N atom in the isoquinoline ring.

data.question: Does the presence of crystalline water molecules affect the initial decomposition temperature of C10H6NO2Cd(NO3)·2H2O?
What is the experimental band-gap of C10H6NO2Cd(NO3)·2H2O?
Can the birefringence of C10H6NO2Cd(NO3)·2H2O be significantly improved by making [NO3]− coplanar with the [C10H6NO2]− unit?
What is the impact of the π-conjugated [C10H6NO2]− group on the exploration of birefringent materials?
data.answer: It plays a positive role in the exploration of birefringent materials.

data.question: What is the crystallographic space group of C10H6NO2Cd(NO3)·2H2O?
